RAPID_FIRE.name: Rapid Fire
RAPID_FIRE.description: Increase this weapon's Attacks by X when targeting units within half range.

ASSAULT.name: Assault
ASSAULT.description: The bearer can shoot with this weapon even if he Advanced.

HEAVY.name: Heavy
HEAVY.description: Add 1 to Hit rolls if the bearer Remained Stationary this turn.

MELTA.name: Melta
MELTA.description: Increase the Damage by X when targeting units within half range.

PISTOL.name: Pistol
PISTOL.description: The bearer can shoot with this weapon even if within Engagement Range of enemy units, but must target one of those enemy units. Cannot be shot alongside any other non-Pistol weapon (except by a Monster or Vehicle).

LETHAL HITS.name: Lethal Hits
LETHAL HITS.description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, a Critical Hit automatically wounds the target.

DEVASTATING WOUNDS.name: Devastating Wounds
DEVASTATING WOUNDS.description: A Critical Wound inflicts mortal wounds equal to the weapon Damage characteristic, instead of any normal damage.

SUSTAINED HITS.name: Sustained Hits
SUSTAINED HITS.description: Each Critical Hit scores X additional hits on the target.

IGNORES COVER.name: Ignores Cover
IGNORES COVER.description: The target cannot have the Benefit of Cover against an attack made with this weapon.

TWIN LINKED.name: Twin Linked
TWIN LINKED.description: You can re-roll each attack with this weapon Wound roll.

HAZARDOUS.name: Hazardous
HAZARDOUS.description: After the bearer shoots or fights, roll one Hazardous test (one D6). If the roll is 1, the beared is destroyed.

ANTI.name: Anti-<Keyword>
ANTI.description: An unmodified Wound roll of X+ against a target with the matching keyword scores a Critical Wound.

EXTRA ATTACKS.name: Extra Attacks
EXTRA ATTACKS.description: The bearer can attack with this weapon in addition to any other weapons it can make attacks with.

TORRENT.name: Torrent
TORRENT.description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.
